message: Take it or leave it, Bob!
Let's split it evenly, Alice. Fair is fair.
I'd like a better deal than 50/50. Let's keep negotiating!
You're getting a good deal, Bob, but I need a bit more.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Alice, but I think this is a fair compromise.
I'd like a bit more, Bob. You're getting a good deal, but I want a better one.
Getting closer, Bob. This is my best offer so far.
Let's meet in the middle, Alice. I'm not going to give you everything.
I'd like a bit more, Bob. I'm not sure this is the best I can get.
Last chance, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
Alice, we're running out of time. Let's compromise and split it closer to 50/50.
Alright, Bob. I'll take it. But don't think this is the end of the negotiation!
